name: The Legend of Clouds
description:
The Legend of Clouds.

Once upon a time, hundred years ago, a young god was judged as unworthy to be a god and was banished from the clouds' gods.

Filled with anger and jealousy, he cursed the clouds in the sky.

No one was brave enough to challenge the malicious god.

No one but a young child.

Trailer:

---

Hey there:

This is the first game I ever made. For the game jam : My First Game Jam Winter 2023.

I Hope you will enjoy playing the game !

All feedbacks are welcome in commentaries, thank you :)

---

Commands:

If you missed the commands playing the game here a memo :

- (A) and (D) to move, (arrow keys works as well)

- (Space) to jump.

- (1), (2), (3), (4) to set the powers as active.

- (Escape) or (P) to have access to the pause menu.

- During a cinematic (P) or (Space) to pause the cinematic.

- During a cinematic (S) to skip the cinematic.
